name: Tampon Trawl
description:
Your friend has sent you an urgent text - she’s stuck in the toilets and desperately needs a tampon. Escape detention and explore the school, avoiding teachers and locker snakes to help out your friend!

Move with either the left and right or 'A' and 'D' keys and interact with objects using the mouse.

Tampon Trawl was originally created with Code Liberation workshops in Autumn 2016 with no previous experience of Unity or coding. It has been exhibited at V&A Friday Lates and BFI's Woman with a Movie Camera Summit 2018.
